extendedInfo.description: Powerful podcast player (podcatcher) for Android. Cast++ Podcast Player helps you discover, subscribe, download and play your podcasts.This is a "Lite" version of Cast++ Podcast Player supports up to 3 subscriptions!Key Features:* Discover & Subscribe your favorite podcasts in many ways by	- Searching by keywords	- Browsing podcast categories	- Browsing popular podcast list	- Importing podcasts from RSS URL directly* Integrated Audio/Video Player	- Streams the audio/video episodes over network	- Plays downloaded audio/video episodes	- Shows front cover and notes of the playing episode	- Toggle video episodes to audio* Instant Refresh Podcast Feeds	Our servers update the podcast feeds in time. Your phone could refresh all podcasts you subscribed in the same time instantly. (Other apps take much time and create huge traffic to update the feeds one by one.)* Integrated Multitask Download Manager with Powerful Controls	Download more than one podcast audio/video files in the same time by the integrated podcast download manager. You can start, pause and continue the download tasks easily.Please email us if you have any issues! Thanks for your support.Cast++ Podcast Player, Enjoy Your Podcasts![Popular Podcasts for Android in Cast++ Podcast Player]This American LifeWNYC's RadiolabDan Carlin's Hardcore HistoryNPR: TED Radio Hour PodcastNPR Programs: Wait Wait... reviews.title: what a relief
reviews.comment: What a relief that this app does not AT ALL repeat my worst problems with  similar apps. I can think of some superficial improvements, but recognize that this app is FUNDAMENTALLY EXCELLENT, and far outstrips others. The interface is easy, and the thing works so well! Particularly appreciate these PERFECTLY-FUNCTIONING features: rewind/fwd/skip around in a stream; easy download vs. streaming option; & seamless, super-easy subscribing. Still checking it out, but rating 5 stars based on my first experiences.
